text: The Golden Helmet of Coțofenești is a missing Geto-Dacian helmet dating from the second half of the 5th century BC. It was discovered from a village in Prahova County in Romania. It was exhibited at the National History Museum of Romania in Bucharest before being stolen in January 2025 during a robbery at the Drents Museum in Assen, the Netherlands. ==References== Category:January 2025 events Category:Helmets
title: Helmet of Coțofenești
